summary: VACUUM PUMP (BRAKES) HOUSING IS BROKEN AND PUMP DOES NOT WORK.  CONTACTED FORD IN SEPT 2001 BUT HAVE HAD NO SUCCESS IN THEM HELPING TO LOCATE THIS PART.  NO SALVAGE YARD OR AUTO PARTS STORE HAS IT.  CAR IS IN VERY GOOD CONDITION BUT IT WOULD BE VERY DANGEROUS TO DRIVE WITH BRAKES IN THIS CONDITION.
